hero.title: Community Outreach
hero.subtitle: Empowering local communities to protect and conserve the critically endangered Philippine crocodile.

list.title: Environmental Education
list.description: We conduct workshops in schools and barangays to raise awareness about crocodile conservation and wetland protection.

list.title: Community Partnerships
list.description: Collaborating with local communities ensures sustainable conservation practices and shared stewardship of natural habitats.

list.title: Livelihood Support
list.description: We help develop sustainable livelihoods that reduce dependence on destructive activities while supporting families.

cta.title: Be Part of the Change
cta.text: Together, we can protect crocodiles, wetlands, and communities for future generations.
